This picture does not accurately depict what the shirt looks like. My kid was expecting an oversized shirt with longer sleeves, a picture down the whole front, and a black “torn” strip at the bottom. The shirt we got was a basic teeshirt shape, not oversized at all, the print was like you would get on a regular tee shirt (not all the way down as shown here), and it had no “torn” piece. Material was like a rash guard. Not what my kid was expecting, so we sent it back.
